name: Ember (itch) (exelotl)
description:
Ember is a game about a girl on a floating island in space, using her computer to identify objects and artifacts.

Controls:

ARROW KEYS - movement
TAB - switch to the next item in your inventory
SPACE - use the current item

If you're struggling to use items, here are some good places to start:

  • the garden to the left
  • the empty table
  • the fireplace

There are 9 items in total, they might not be easy to find. If you
wait a while the computer might give you some hints. Otherwise, just sit
and enjoy the ambience. :)
